title: Opinion: Researchers have a moral obligation to push back when their studies are twisted to promote false health claims
description: NewsGuard has collected 1,000 provably false statements in its False Claim Fingerprints database. Many involve misrepresented research.
content: NewsGuard has collected 1,000 provably false statements in its False Claim Fingerprints database. Many involve misrepresented research.
